name: AbdomenCTWithoutContrast
title: Abdomen CT without contrast
description:
This value set is used to calculate OP-10 (Abdomen CTâ€”Use of Contrast Material), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. Patients are eligible for inclusion in the OP-10 measure denominator if their provider performs an abdomen/abdominopelvic CT without contrast, with contrast, or without then with contrast. Patients are eligible for inclusion in the OP-10 measure numerator if their provider performs an abdomen/abdominopelvic CT without contrast.
Please reference the OP-10 annual reevaluation report for more details on the measure's denominator, numerator, and exclusion criteria.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes for abdomen and abdominopelvic CT studies performed without contrast.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with claims-based evidence of an abdomen or abdominopelvic CT study performed without contrast.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes for abdomen or abdominopelvic CT studies performed without contrast are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: CPT codes not associated with abdomen or abdominopelvic CT studies performed without contrast are excluded from this value set. Terminologies other than CPT are also excluded from this value set.)
